topic.title: Overview

body.p: The DIGI-G5 SDK provides a set of APIs for a Customer Control Plane Application to communicate with firmware running on the DIGI-G5 integrated CPU processor by means of the internal message interface over the PCIe bus. The SDK provides C callable APIs encapsulating the full functionality of the device. Requests are sent to the device and responses are retrieved via the message interface. The SDK includes a Platform Abstraction Layer which provides OS/RTOS/System specific porting interface for the SDK to access OS/RTOS resources as well as communicate with the DIGI-G5 Device over PCIe bus.
